00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.OPMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class Head
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public Head()
00040         {
00041             Docs="http://www.opml.org/spec2";
00042             DateCreated = DateTime.Now;
00043             DateModified = DateTime.Now;
00044         }
00045 
00050         public Head(XmlElement Element)
00051         {
00052             try
00053             {
00054                 if (Element.Name.Equals("head", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00055                 {
00056                     foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00057                     {
00058                         try
00059                         {
00060                             if (Child.Name.Equals("title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00061                             {
00062                                 Title = Child.InnerText;
00063                             }
00064                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("ownerName", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00065                             {
00066                                 OwnerName = Child.InnerText;
00067                             }
00068                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("ownerEmail", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00069                             {
00070                                 OwnerEmail = Child.InnerText;
00071                             }
00072                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("dateCreated", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00073                             {
00074                                 DateCreated = DateTime.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00075                             }
00076                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("dateModified", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00077                             {
00078                                 DateModified = DateTime.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00079                             }
00080                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("docs", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00081                             {
00082                                 Docs = Child.InnerText;
00083                             }
00084                         }
00085                         catch { }
00086                     }
00087                 }
00088             }
00089             catch { throw; }
00090         }
00091         #endregion
00092 
00093         #region Properties
00094 
00095 
00096 
00097         public string Title { get; set; }
00098 
00102         public DateTime DateCreated { get; set; }
00103 
00107         public DateTime DateModified { get; set; }
00108 
00112         public string OwnerName { get; set; }
00113 
00117         public string OwnerEmail { get; set; }
00118 
00122         public string Docs { get; set; }
00123         #endregion
00124 
00125         #region Overridden Functions
00126         public override string ToString()
00127         {
00128             try
00129             {
00130                 StringBuilder HeadString = new StringBuilder();
00131                 HeadString.Append("<head>");
00132                 HeadString.Append("<title>" + Title + "</title>\r\n");
00133                 HeadString.Append("<dateCreated>" + DateCreated.ToString("R") + "</dateCreated>\r\n");
00134                 HeadString.Append("<dateModified>" + DateModified.ToString("R") + "</dateModified>\r\n");
00135                 HeadString.Append("<ownerName>" + OwnerName + "</ownerName>\r\n");
00136                 HeadString.Append("<ownerEmail>" + OwnerEmail + "</ownerEmail>\r\n");
00137                 HeadString.Append("<docs>" + Docs + "</docs>\r\n");
00138                 HeadString.Append("</head>\r\n");
00139                 return HeadString.ToString();
00140             }
00141             catch { throw; }
00142         }
00143         #endregion
00144     }
00145 }
